title: Riot missed an opportunity with the Garen Rework
body: +Bonus Damage for 2 seconds when exiting a bush. I'm pretty sure we all know why. They could have it made it fit the power budget, and it'd be thematic with both their vision (juggernaut running right at them and combating), and with our meta knowledge of Garen (Brush Lord).

He sorta has this in an abstract way on Judgment now.

"Judgment deals 33% increased damage when hitting a single enemy." This will probably overlap with most of the cases where the above brush mechanic would provide bonus damage.
Wait, is that going to be changed from "Judgement deals 25% less damage when hitting multiple enemies"? Perhaps with a 25% damage reduction? Bwahahaha. Well done, sir. :P
The art of wording things so they sound good but actually are the same.

It's odd isn't it? if you give him 100 damage and reduce it by 25 in one case, everyone gets mad.

but if you give him 75 damage and increase it by 25 in the opposite case, everyone is happy.
All about that [framing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Framing_(social_sciences)), baby.
tis the same. 33% of 75 is 25, so 100% damage total when hitting one enemy
Yeah, that's what I was talking about. The wording changes it from a drawback in certain situations to a bonus in the opposite ones, but nothing actually changes. It's great!
